description: Adds or updates tags for a resource in CodeCommit. For a list of valid resources in CodeCommit, see CodeCommit Resources and Operations in the CodeCommit User Guide.

parameters.name: resourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to which you want to add or update tags.

parameters.name: tags
parameters.description: The key-value pair to use when tagging this repository. (string) --- (string) ---
